name: Applicants by Source (Query Report)
query:
SELECT
  IFNULL(custom_source_of_application, 'Unknown') AS source,
  COUNT(name) AS total_applicants
FROM `tabJob Applicant`
GROUP BY source
ORDER BY total_applicants DESC;

name: Tax Deduction Comparison
query:
SELECT
    ss.employee,
    e.employee_name,
    e.custom_tax_regime_preference,
    SUM(CASE WHEN ssd.salary_component = 'Income Tax' THEN ssd.amount ELSE 0 END) AS total_tax
FROM `tabSalary Slip` ss
INNER JOIN `tabEmployee` e ON ss.employee = e.name
INNER JOIN `tabSalary Detail` ssd ON ssd.parent = ss.name
WHERE ss.docstatus = 1
AND ssd.parentfield = 'deductions'
GROUP BY ss.employee, e.employee_name, e.custom_tax_regime_preference
ORDER BY e.employee_name;
